type.name: org.gradle.TaskExecutionRequest
type.description:
A request to execute some tasks, along with an optional project path context to provide information necessary to select the tasks
@since 2.0

method.name: getProjectPath
method.description:
Project path associated with this task request if any.

returns:project path or null to use the default project path.

method.name: getArgs
method.description:
The arguments to use to select and optionally configure the tasks, as if provided on the command-line.

returns:task name.

property.name: args
property.description:
The arguments to use to select and optionally configure the tasks, as if provided on the command-line.

returns:task name.

property.name: projectPath
property.description:
Project path associated with this task request if any.

returns:project path or null to use the default project path.
